bio: Entranced by evil power, Darkyubi has a dark soul. He wants to crush all hope and send the world into despair...or does he?

soultimate.name: Alpha Omega
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Deals damage to foes at a rate of 6% every 2 seconds for 15 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to make foes' HP decrease steadily.

skill.effect: Increases amount of HP absorbed by 100%.
skill.name: Dark Drain

name: Darkyubi
